dentists.name: Dr. Hesham Sherghin
dentists.bio: Dr. Hesham Sherghin received his Doctor of Dental Surgery from the University of Detroit Mercy and completed his Advanced Education in General Dentistry (AEGD) program. He is an active member of several study clubs and provides a comfortable, family-friendly environment for patients of all ages. The clinic focuses on advanced dentistry with a personal touch, ensuring optimal oral health and beautiful smiles.
education: Doctor of Dental Surgery - University of Detroit Mercy
Member of Multiple Dental Study Clubs
testimonials: Friendly staff, great place for kids to feel comfortable and excited about going to the dentist. - Nikki N.
Amazing very nice dentists that treat you well and good customer service. - Sean K.

dentists.name: Dr. Aura Hidalgo
dentists.address: 639 Southdale Road East, London, ON N6E 3M2
dentists.bio: Dr. Aura Hidalgo and her team at Smiles on Southdale provide a friendly environment for patients of all ages. They offer a wide range of services, including digital radiography, cleanings, aligners, and emergency appointments. The clinic is known for its convenient hours and welcoming atmosphere.

dentists.name: Dr. Jeff Edwards
dentists.address: 431 Boler Road, Unit 8, London, ON N6K 2K8
dentists.bio: Dr. Jeff Edwards and his team at Byronwood Dental have been serving the London community since the 1950s. They offer a wide range of services, including root canal therapy, dental implants, and teeth whitening. The clinic is known for its patient-centered approach and commitment to providing the highest standard of care.
testimonials: Dr. Edwards is an excellent, caring dentist and last Friday he proved his dedication! - Lisa B
Always a positive experience, thorough professional care delivered with a side of humour makes it a fun place to visit. - Anita Z
I always enjoy my experience; I feel that they have my best interests at heart. - Rob S

dentists.name: Dr. Lucy
dentists.address: 1454 Adelaide St N, London, ON N5X 1J9
dentists.bio: Dr. Lucy and her team at NorthView Dental are committed to providing personalized, gentle, and first-class dental care. They utilize the latest technologies to ensure patients achieve and maintain optimal oral health. The clinic is known for its relaxing environment and multilingual staff.
testimonials: North View Dental is a great office and I would recommend it to everyone!!! - Anonymous
Northview Dental has always exceeded my expectations and have been fair with me, in every way. They are respectful, yet fun! - Carolyn

dentists.name: Dr. Sbenati
dentists.address: 1195 Hyde Park Rd unit 1, London, ON N6H 5K6
dentists.bio: Dr. Sbenati and his team offer a wide range of dental services, including cavity treatment, teeth cleaning, and dental exams. The clinic is known for its modern amenities, including free Wi-Fi and insurance acceptance.
testimonials: I can't say enough great things about this dental office! Dr. Sbenati is truly a dental magician. From the moment I walked in, I felt at ease, and the whole team was welcoming and professional. - Stacey D.

dentists.name: Dr Puneet Bhatnagar
dentists.address: 4-665 Fanshawe Park Road West, London, ON N6G5B4
dentists.bio: Dr. Puneet Bhatnagar is a graduate of the Schulich School of Medicine & Dentistry at the University of Western Ontario.â€‹ He enjoys all aspects of clinical dentistry & has a special interest in surgical procedures. He has completed the NobelFellow Implant training & a MiniResidency in Implant Prosthetics with Nobel Biocare. He believes in the kind of dentistry that keeps the patient's well being at the center point of the treatment plan. Dr. Bhatnagar is also an MBA graduate and has completed an executive program at the renowned Rotman School of Management at the University of Toronto. This experience has helped him in understanding the challenges of improving healthcare access and delivery.
